## üì¶ Quick Download - All Files

### Core Planning Documents

**1. PROJECT MASTER PLAN (Markdown)**
- **What:** Complete system architecture, technology stack, timeline, risk management
- **Download:** [PROJECT_MASTER_PLAN.md](https://www.genspark.ai/api/files/s/TIUgOLgJ?)
- **Size:** 9.2 KB

**2. API SPECIFICATION (Markdown)**
- **What:** WebSocket protocol, REST endpoints, JSON schemas, error codes
- **Download:** [API_SPECIFICATION_v2.0.md](https://www.genspark.ai/api/files/s/JRYMETXK?)
- **Size:** 11.9 KB

**3. QUICK START COORDINATOR GUIDE (Markdown)**
- **What:** Your step-by-step coordination playbook with checklists
- **Download:** [QUICK_START_COORDINATOR_GUIDE.md](https://www.genspark.ai/api/files/s/IlMn37Dy?)
- **Size:** 9.1 KB

## üë• Agent Briefings (Individual Assignment Documents)

**AGENT #1: Desktop Application Lead**
- **Assignment:** Build Windows Electron desktop app
- **Download:** [AGENT_BRIEFING_1_Desktop_Lead.md](https://www.genspark.ai/api/files/s/5Yt6JFop?)
- **Size:** 17.3 KB
- **Tech Stack:** Electron, React, SQLite, WebSocket

**AGENT #2: Android v2.0 Lead**
- **Assignment:** Upgrade Android app with MMS support
- **Download:** [AGENT_BRIEFING_2_Android_Lead.md](https://www.genspark.ai/api/files/s/b8yjLk4c?)
- **Size:** 26.0 KB
- **Tech Stack:** Java/Kotlin, Android SDK, MMS API

**AGENT #3: Network Bridge Engineer**
- **Assignment:** Build WebSocket bridge between desktop and phone
- **Download:** [AGENT_BRIEFING_3_Bridge_Engineer.md](https://www.genspark.ai/api/files/s/gCqQu9NC?)
- **Size:** 28.7 KB
- **Tech Stack:** Java WebSocket, Android Service, mDNS

**AGENT #4: Phone Companion Service Developer**
- **Assignment:** Build background service lifecycle manager
- **Download:** [AGENT_BRIEFING_4_Companion_Service.md](https://www.genspark.ai/api/files/s/4zeYw5tY?)
- **Size:** 25.3 KB
- **Tech Stack:** Java, Android Foreground Service, Battery Optimization

## üìã How to Use This Package

### For You (Project Coordinator):

1. **Download all 7 files above**
2. **Save to:** `C:\Users\john\OneDrive\MyProjects\ClubSMS\`
3. **Read:** QUICK_START_COORDINATOR_GUIDE.md first
4. **Reference:** API_SPECIFICATION_v2.0.md for technical questions

### For Each Agent:

Send them:
- Their specific AGENT_BRIEFING file
- The API_SPECIFICATION_v2.0.md file
- Their git branch name
- Their OneDrive save location

- Documentation: Create `docs/` folder and commit these files
